description: Affinity Photo is similar to Adobe Photoshop , providing tools for photographers and other digital artists to edit images. To save time applying edits to an image, you can record repetitive tasks, save them as a macro, then export the macro as an AFMACRO file.

To create an AFMACRO file with Affinity Photo, click the "Record" symbol in the Macro panel, perform your actions, click the "Stop" symbol, then select the "Export" icon. If the Macro panel is not visible, select Window â†’ Macro .
